-Highest rated! Fan favorite! -[thudding]
I'm the star man! You don't do this to the star man!
translation.es: ¡Soy la estrella! ¡No se le hace esto a la estrella!

translation.en: And you are huge! In R&B, though.
Stacy K is number one in Pop.
translation.es: Stacy K es la número uno en pop.

translation.en: In New York, and Los Angeles, and soon to be the entire nation!
translation.es: En Nueva York y Los Ángeles, y pronto lo será en todo el país.

translation.en: This is out of nowhere, Marshall. Is that it? We're off the air?
translation.es: Esto salió de la nada, Marshall. ¿Eso es todo? ¿Estamos fuera del aire?

translation.en: The devil is a lie!
Why would you think that I would possess that kind of energy to do that to you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que tendría la energía para hacerles eso?

translation.en: -Come on! No, you have not. -You know what?
-Oh. Thank God. -I got a little emotional.
translation.es: - ¿Sabes qué? - No puede ser. - Me exalté un poco. - Sí.

translation.en: You did.
I'm going to give you a grand finale show tomorrow.
translation.es: Te daré un gran programa final mañana.

translation.en: [yelling] Oh, come on, man! I got kids, man.
-It's Christmas! -And I feel you!
translation.es: ¡Vamos, hombre! Tengo hijos, viejo. ¡Es Navidad! Te entiendo, de hombre negro a hombre negro.

translation.en: Black man on black man. Look... [slaps]
translation.es: Te entiendo, de hombre negro a hombre negro.

translation.en: The holidays is coming up, I get that, and it's hard on everybody.
translation.es: Las fiestas se acercan, entiendo eso, y es difícil para todos.

translation.en: I mean, not me. 'Cause I'm cashing in. Big time.
translation.es: Digo, no para mí. Porque estoy cobrando. Mucho.

translation.en: You really gonna look us in our eye and say that? You gonna fix your mouth
translation.es: ¿De verdad dijiste eso? ¿Vas a decir eso ahora, después de la reunión?

translation.en: to say that after we met today? You know why we met, Marshall!
translation.es: ¿Vas a decir eso ahora, después de la reunión? ¡Sabes por qué nos reunimos hoy, Marshall! ¿Ves esto aquí?

translation.en: You see this right here?
translation.es: ¡Sabes por qué nos reunimos hoy, Marshall! ¿Ves esto aquí?

translation.en: This is a plan. Know what's in it?
-[Marshall] What-- -Graphs! Pie charts!
A proposal to own part of this station, Marshall!
translation.es: ¡Una propuesta para ser dueños de esta estación!

translation.en: And I understand that, [stammers] but you...
[stammering] This... These... Are these the numbers?
Oh, my God.
I'm so mad y'all didn't become part owners before the deal went through.
translation.es: Me enoja que no se volvieran dueños antes del trato.

translation.en: -I mean, look at this. These numbers... -Okay, okay.
translation.es: - Mira esto. Estos números... - De acuerdo.

translation.en: At least we got our bonuses to look forward to.
[stammers] Got your what?
[stammers] Our bonuses.
-WMLE does the bonuses. -Oh! Oh, your bonuses. Oh...
translation.es: - WMLE da los bonos. - Sus bonos.

translation.en: Yeah... about that...
I don't believe this. How they gon' do this to us?
translation.es: No lo puedo creer. ¿Cómo nos van a hacer esto?

translation.en: [Roxy] Exactly. This is ridiculous.
[Rush] H-how did she even get the position? [Roxy] I should've seen this coming.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo consiguió el puesto? - Debí verlo venir.

translation.en: [Rush] Hey, I guarantee you, they gon' regret it.
I guarantee you they gon'-- they gon' be callin' me back.
translation.es: Te aseguro que se arrepentirán. Me llamarán de vuelta.

translation.en: -Oh, this is painful, Roxy. -I know, but--
translation.es: - Qué doloroso, Roxy. - Lo sé, pero...

translation.en: No, no, this changes too much.
This changes too much.
When I walk into that booth, and I settle into my chair, and I lean in...
translation.es: Cuando entro a esa cabina, me acomodo en mi silla y me reclino...

translation.en: I smell the metal of that microphone...
and it gets me going.
The second that mic is hot, we are live, and that is my moment
translation.es: En cuanto el micrófono está listo, estamos en vivo, y ese es mi momento

translation.en: to connect with my people.
And you might think that I'm freestyling, but no, my message is clear,
translation.es: Podrías pensar que estoy improvisando, pero no, mi mensaje es claro,

translation.en: and it is from my heart.
Every... single show, I try to nail that.
translation.es: Intento hacer bien cada uno de los programas.

translation.en: Every single day, for all these years and to just...
translation.es: Todos los días, durante todos estos años y solo...

translation.en: To just have it yanked away from you like...
It just feels like I'm losing a body part. -[wind, vehicles whirring]
translation.es: Siento como si estuviera perdiendo una parte del cuerpo.

translation.en: And I-- I'm not ready to say goodbye. I'm not.
translation.es: Y no estoy listo para despedirme. No lo estoy.

translation.en: Listen...
we've been knocked down before.
We just got to find a way to get off the pavement, that's all.
translation.es: Tenemos que encontrar la manera de levantarnos, eso es todo.

translation.en: What am I going to tell the kids, though? Okay, Christmas is around the corner!
translation.es: ¿Qué les diré a los niños? ¡Ya casi es Navidad!

translation.en: Man, those little faces. They just want so much.
I mean expect so much. Not so much expect, as demand.
translation.es: Me refiero a que esperan mucho. Más bien, exigen mucho.

translation.en: They threaten me, even. [stammers] I tell you, the twins pulled a knife.
translation.es: Incluso me amenazan. Las gemelas sacaron un cuchillo.

translation.en: Hey, this is going to work out.
translation.es: Oye... Todo va a salir bien.

translation.en: It is.
'Tis the season, right? Just got to have a little faith.
translation.es: Es la temporada, ¿no? Hay que tener fe.

translation.en: Do you really believe that?
Isn't that what people are supposed to say during Christmas?
translation.es: ¿No se supone que la gente dice eso en Navidad?

translation.en: Come on. I'll drop you home. Come on.
translation.es: Vamos. Te llevaré a casa. Anda.

translation.en: -Okay, girls. -[bags rustling]
Okay.
-Let me help you, Daddy. -Oh, thank you, baby girl. Here you go.
translation.es: - Déjame ayudarte, papi. - Gracias, cariño. Aquí tienes.

translation.en: That one, there. Don't forget that one.
translation.es: Esa de ahí. No olvides ese.

translation.en: Good looking out.
[Evie] What kind of snack are you making for us? [Gabby] I want pizza.
translation.es: - ¿Qué bocadillo nos vas a preparar? - ¡Quiero pizza!

translation.en: [Rush] Thanks for--
Oh, no. What am I going to do about the pool?
translation.es: No. ¿Qué voy a hacer con la piscina?

translation.en: [Gabby] No worries, Mya had a "come-to-Jesus" with Daniels.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Mya habló con Daniels.

translation.en: Straight up, she lit a fire under him.
translation.es: Lo motivó a trabajar más duro.

translation.en: But there's going to be something called OT.
translation.es: Pero habrá algo llamado tiempo extra.

translation.en: [Rush] Really? Lacrosse?
-[Evie] Yes, Daddy. -[Gabby] It builds team work.
translation.es: - Sí, papi. - Es trabajo en equipo.

translation.en: Yeah, but these things cost a lot of money.
translation.es: Sí, pero estas cosas son caras.

translation.en: Yeah, we're really bad at it, too.
translation.es: Sí, y también somos muy malas.

translation.en: Well, you should give it up! Only rich people play lacrosse.
translation.es: ¡Deberían renunciar! Solo los ricos juegan lacrosse.

translation.en: -I know. -Right?
-[descending footsteps] -[Mya] We're home!
Oh, Pops, you're home. I've been waiting. I got the email.
translation.es: Papá, estás en casa. He estado esperando. Recibí el correo.

translation.en: -Oh, you got the email. -[Jamal] Yeah.
-Oh, my God, you got the email. -[Evie] Open it! I want to see it!
[Gabby, high pitch] Hey. Oh, my goodness!
Gabby, take my phone.
We need to memorialize my triumph. Dad, get behind me for the reaction shot.
translation.es: Debemos conmemorar mi triunfo. Papá, ponte detrás de mí para la reacción.

translation.en: -[giggling] -Yes.
All right. I waited to open this together.
translation.es: Bien. Esperé para que lo abriéramos juntos.

translation.en: One for the Jamal Williams future archives.
translation.es: Para los futuros archivos de Jamal Williams.

translation.en: Definitely wanna film both our faces when we find out.
translation.es: Quiero filmar las dos caras cuando nos enteremos.

translation.en: Son, will you open the email? You're killing me, just open the email.
translation.es: ¿Puedes abrir el correo? Me estás matando. Solo abre el correo.

translation.en: Okay, I love that you're as excited as I am.
translation.es: Me encanta que estés tan emocionado como yo.

translation.en: -[Rush] Hey, Jamal. -Yeah.
It is okay if you don't get in. Okay?
translation.es: Está bien si no entras. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: I didn't go away to college, and I don't want you to think of it as a failure.
translation.es: Yo no me fui lejos a la universidad y no debes verlo como un fracaso.

translation.en: I want you to think of it as carrying on that family tradition, right?
translation.es: Quiero que lo consideres una tradición familiar. ¿Sí?

translation.en: -'Cause that tradition-- -I got in!
-[Mya gasps] -I'm in!
-Who's going to Harvard? Me! That's right. -[Rush] Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Quién irá a Harvard? Yo, así es. - Sí.

translation.en: -Man, you must be so pumped for me. -Oh, I am, of course, I mean... [chuckles]
translation.es: - Debes estar muy emocionado por mí. - Claro, quiero decir...

translation.en: It's great if you're into that Ivy League-y sort of vibe, you know?
translation.es: Es genial si te gusta ese estilo de la Liga Ivy.

translation.en: -Yay! -[Rush] You know what you should do?
You should check out my Alma Mater. For safety.
translation.es: Deberías ver mi Alma Mater. Por seguridad.

translation.en: The Queensborough Community College? Instead of Harvard?
translation.es: ¿El Colegio Comunitario de Queensborough? ¿En lugar de Harvard?

translation.en: -[Jamal] Oh, you are hilarious. -I got you.
Oh, man. And look, no worries. I checked and paying a little extra,
translation.es: Cielos. Y mira, no te preocupes. Averigüé y si pagas un poco más, puedo estacionar en el campus.

translation.en: a freshman can park a car on campus.
translation.es: Averigüé y si pagas un poco más, puedo estacionar en el campus.

translation.en: -There's no car. There's no car. -Yeah, yeah. It's not December 25th yet.
translation.es: - No hay auto. - Sí. Aún no es el 25 de diciembre.

translation.en: We're taking the Jamal Williams experience to Ivy League!
translation.es: Llevaremos la experiencia de Jamal a la Liga Ivy.

translation.en: -[girls, together] Yay! -[laughing]
You're too young to be referring to yourself as a brand.
translation.es: Eres muy joven para referirte a ti mismo como marca.

translation.en: -You know that? -[Jamal] You do it all the time.
translation.es: Eres muy joven para referirte a ti mismo como marca. Tú siempre lo haces.

translation.en: -[Rush] Uh-huh. -So... [exhales]
[kids chanting] Harvard! Harvard! Harvard!
Why did I have to have smart kids? Dumb kids are way cheaper.
translation.es: ¿Por qué tuve hijos inteligentes? Los tontos son mucho más baratos.

translation.en: Why aren't you sharing in that child's joy?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no compartes la alegría de ese niño?

translation.en: 'Cause it's over. It's all over. We are ruined. Ruined!
translation.es: Porque se acabó. Se acabó. ¡Estamos arruinados! ¡Arruinados!

translation.en: It's a dark day, Aunt Jo.
translation.es: Es un día oscuro, tía Jo.

translation.en: It's dark. It's a dark day. I don't know what happened.
translation.es: Es oscuro. Es un día oscuro. No sé qué pasó.

translation.en: I ain't even see it coming.
Are you done? For whatever that was?
translation.es: ¿Ya terminaste con lo que haya sido eso?

translation.en: The radio station sold.
Job gone.
No more radio. It's done.
-You've saved. I know you've saved. -How, Aunt Jo?
translation.es: - Ahorraste. Sé que ahorraste. - ¿Cómo, tía Jo?

translation.en: The bills, they get higher every month. We got fresh bills!
translation.es: Las cuentas suben todos los meses. ¡Tenemos nuevas cuentas!

translation.en: Jamal had to go to Costa Rica to volunteer to dig wells,
translation.es: Jamal tuvo que ir a Costa Rica de voluntario para cavar pozos,

translation.en: so that they could have "clean water."
Mya's platinum status on Saks.com, and the twins, there's two of them!
translation.es: La cuenta platino de Mya en Saks.com. Y las gemelas. ¡Son dos!

translation.en: And they all go to private school. Not to mention, it's Christmas.
translation.es: Y todos van a una escuela privada. Ni hablar de que es Navidad.

translation.en: Rashon James Williams!
You spoil those kids.
They snap their fingers, and you open your wallet.
translation.es: Chasquean los dedos y abres la billetera.

translation.en: I've been trying to be both parents.
Give them everything they wanted because I can't be everything,
translation.es: Darles todo lo que quieren porque no puedo ser todo.

translation.en: and yeah, okay, [stammering] maybe I gave a little too much.
translation.es: Y sí, bueno, tal vez di un poco de más.

translation.en: You think?
That life's about to change.
translation.es: Esa vida está a punto de cambiar.

translation.en: -Straight up. -Oh, yeah.
We're about to make some changes around here.
translation.es: Estamos por hacer unos cambios por aquí.

translation.en: -Snap the whip. -[chuckles]
Things about to get tight. They about to get lean.
translation.es: Las cosas se van a poner difíciles. Va a haber ajustes.

translation.en: These kids gonna be giving up a whole lot. How do I tell them that?
translation.es: Estos chicos van a renunciar a mucho. ¿Cómo les digo eso?

translation.en: I don't wanna tell them that. Aunt Jo, please.
translation.es: No quiero decirles eso. Tía Jo, por favor.

translation.en: You tell them and bake 'em a pie, okay? I'mma go lay down.
translation.es: Tú díselo y hornea un pastel, ¿sí? Voy a acostarme.

translation.en: This is not a pie situation, son.
translation.es: Esta no es una situación para comer pastel, hijo.

translation.en: Remember what your granddaddy said.
translation.es: Recuerda lo que dijo tu abuelito.

translation.en: It's not what you got, it's what you got around you.
translation.es: No es lo que tienes... ...sino lo que te rodea.

translation.en: [whispering] What about Christmas for the kids?
It's going to be all right.
Have a little faith.
Everybody keeps telling me that.
[Rush] That was the Everly Brothers,
"Christmas Eve Can Kill You."
Stay tuned for a word from our sponsors.
translation.es: Quédense para escuchar un mensaje de nuestros patrocinadores.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
Rush out.
Forever.
-[smooth jazz Christmas music playing] -[Janella] Should I call 911?
Rush's mental state doesn't seem stable.
translation.es: El estado mental de Rush no parece estable.

translation.en: That's not the note we should have gone out on for your last show.
translation.es: No deberíamos haber usado ese tono para tu último programa.

translation.en: You want fans to follow you wherever you go.
translation.es: Quieres que los fans te sigan a donde vayas.

translation.en: Not follow you off a cliff.
translation.es: No que te sigan por un precipicio.

translation.en: You got to rise above this nonsense.
Be Rush.
Be my star.
Well, if I'm going down in flames...
translation.es: Si voy a fracasar a lo grande...

translation.en: I'm glad you're the one burning with me.
-We're poor? -[funky music playing]
-Did I say we were poor? -But you don't have a job.
translation.es: - ¿Dije que éramos pobres? - Pero no tienes trabajo.

translation.en: And you pretty much broadcasted that to everyone.
Brilliant!
-So, no horse? -It's mini-sized.
None of that is happening, okay?
In fact, there's a whole lot of not happening
translation.es: De hecho, hay muchas cosas que no sucederán

translation.en: -that's about to start happening. -[groans]
translation.es: - que están por comenzar. - ¿Harvard no va a suceder?

translation.en: -Wait, is Harvard not happening? -I want it to.
translation.es: - que están por comenzar. - ¿Harvard no va a suceder? Quiero que suceda.

translation.en: -So, what's the plan? -I don't know yet, son.
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el plan? Aún no lo sé, hijo.

translation.en: -Great. -Great.
Hey, give me some time.
-Unbelievable. -So bad.
-[retreating footsteps] -[Gabby] This is worse than bad!
[Rush] Y'all sitting all off in the bleachers -like y'all can't hear the conversation? -[Roxy sighs]
translation.es: ¿Están sentadas en las gradas como si no pudieran hablar?

translation.en: Looks like you have plans for a holly jolly Christmas.
translation.es: Parece que tienes planes para una feliz Navidad.

translation.en: [sighs] Rush, we need to talk.
-Did it come through yet? -It's getting close. [exhales]
-[Aunt Jo] Did you tell him yet? -I don't have all the details.
translation.es: - ¿Ya le dijiste? - Bueno, no tengo todos los detalles.

translation.en: You know, I kinda like and dislike the fact that y'all are so close.
translation.es: Me agrada y me desagrada que sean tan cercanas.

translation.en: -Mostly dislike. -[Roxy] Okay.
Rush, what if I told you that Krush BQL is for sale?
translation.es: Rush, ¿y si te dijera que Krush BQL está a la venta?

translation.en: Well, great, more people losing their jobs.
No, it closed down a couple months ago.
translation.es: No, cerró hace un par de meses.

translation.en: The building is for sale. The station is up for grabs.
translation.es: El edificio está a la venta. - La estación está disponible. - WBQL está a la venta. ¿Qué hay de cenar?

translation.en: So, WBQL is for sale. What's for dinner?
translation.es: - La estación está disponible. - WBQL está a la venta. ¿Qué hay de cenar?

translation.en: I figured you'd make it after you finish all your decoration.
translation.es: Creí que tú cocinarías después de terminar tu decoración.

translation.en: Hey! Listen to me. We should buy that station.
With what, Roxy? My megawatt smile?
With money!
I built up a pretty hefty 401k.
translation.es: Tengo una cuenta de ahorros considerable.

translation.en: You'd put that up for me?
For us.
I'm touched, Roxy, for real.
But it'd take a much bigger Christmas miracle than that.
translation.es: Pero necesitamos un milagro de Navidad más grande.

translation.en: [Aunt Jo] Is this big enough?
That's sweet, Aunt Jo. But I don't think your little coffee can stash is going to help much.
translation.es: Qué tierna, tía Jo, pero no creo que tu pequeño ahorro pueda ayudar mucho.

translation.en: [chuckles] There's $45,000 in there.
You wouldn't happen to have more of these stashed under the house, huh?
translation.es: ¿No tendrías un par de estos escondidos por la casa?

translation.en: Oh, no, honey, that's my mad money.
translation.es: No, cariño, esa es mi caja chica.

translation.en: My investment manager takes care of all the big stuff.
translation.es: Mi inversionista se ocupa de todo lo importante.

translation.en: Wait, does everyone else have money stashed away but me?
translation.es: Espera, ¿todos tienen dinero guardado, menos yo?

translation.en: 'Cause my money just seems to fly away before I can grab it.
translation.es: Porque mi dinero vuela antes de que pueda agarrarlo.

translation.en: -Rush. -Yes?
You got your first break at that station, right?
translation.es: Tu primera oportunidad fue en esa estación.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Let's get back to where we started. Isn't that what we always dreamed of?
translation.es: ¿No? Volvamos a donde empezamos. ¿No es lo que siempre soñamos?

translation.en: That station is way down the dial, Roxy.
translation.es: Esa estación está muy abajo, Roxy.

translation.en: Yeah, but I miss the time when we ruled the airwaves.
translation.es: Sí, pero extraño la época en que dominábamos la radio.

translation.en: We just got kicked off the airwaves last week.
translation.es: Nos echaron del aire la semana pasada.

translation.en: We could be a part of the community again, right?
translation.es: Podríamos volver a ser parte de la comunidad, ¿no?

translation.en: Remember block parties, and pop-up concerts?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas las fiestas en la calle y los conciertos improvisados?

translation.en: Charity drives?
We could sponsor Christmas dinner at First Community Church.
translation.es: Podríamos patrocinar la cena navideña en la Iglesia Primera Comunidad.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Come on, we used to live for that.
translation.es: - Sí. - Vamos, solíamos vivir para eso.

translation.en: And the WMLE suits shut all of that down, and we can bring it all back.
translation.es: Los ejecutivos de WMLE cancelaron todo eso y podemos recuperarlo.

translation.en: -[serene instrumentals] -Can't you see it?
We get to play the music we want.
We get to play the music we want.
It's like the universe is screaming at us right now.
translation.es: Es como si el universo nos estuviera gritando.

translation.en: Let's build Krush BQL back up.
-We'd be taking a huge risk huge. -Huge, yeah.
Risk? Eh... Why don't you let me handle that?
Yeah? Is that a yes?
Yeah?
-Start counting. -Yes!
Oh, it's about to be real merry up in here.
translation.es: Está a punto de ponerse festivo aquí.

translation.en: -Wow. Okay. All right. -Whoo!
-[melodic] Rush and Roxy! -[Rush] Hey!
-That's it. -[Rush] Oh!
-[indistinct chatter] -All right. Old school. Never mind.
Listen, hey, I'm seeing a bright star on our horizon.
translation.es: Escuchen, veo una estrella brillante en el horizonte.

translation.en: -[playful Christmas instrumentals] -An opportunity for all of us.
My old station,
the one that got the Rush engine on the track to begin with, is for sale.
translation.es: la que prendió el motor Rush, está a la venta.

translation.en: And Roxy and I are buying it.
translation.es: Y Roxy y yo la compraremos.

translation.en: Sounds like somebody's spending money we don't have.
translation.es: Alguien está gastando dinero que no tenemos.

translation.en: Will you hear me out?
I'm going to need all of you.
translation.es: Los voy a necesitar a todos.

translation.en: Even Aunt Jo kicked in a little cash.
translation.es: Hasta la tía Jo puso un poco de dinero.

translation.en: -And I know that it's Christmas-- -[Mya] Oh.
I figured Christmas was already off the table.
translation.es: Pensé que Navidad ya estaba fuera de discusión.

translation.en: Not necessarily, but there will be some sacrifices.
translation.es: No necesariamente, pero habrá algunos sacrificios.

translation.en: Now, in order for me to come up with my share of the money to buy the station,
translation.es: Para que yo ponga mi parte del dinero para comprar la estación...

translation.en: -I'm going to need to... [muffled speech] -What?
-[Mya] What was that? -I'm sorry, what?
I said, I'm going to need to put the house... [garbling]
translation.es: Dije que voy a tener que poner la casa...

translation.en: -[Gabby] Hmm? -You have to speak louder.
I'm going to need to sell our house.
translation.es: Voy a tener que vender nuestra casa.

translation.en: -Wait, our house? -Oh, snap!
I didn't see homeless on the menu.
I am always going to provide for you kids, okay? [stammering] But let's face it.
translation.es: Siempre voy a mantenerlos, ¿sí? Pero aceptémoslo.

translation.en: We've gotten a little... What's the word?
translation.es: Nos hemos vuelto un poco... ¿Cuál es la palabra?

translation.en: Bougie.
Will you finish eating your pizza, please?
Now, stay with me.
Just stay with me, here. I want you to think big picture, right?
translation.es: Solo escuchen esto. Quiero que se imaginen el panorama.

translation.en: This is a better future for all of us. This is our way out of this mess.
translation.es: Este es un mejor futuro para todos nosotros. Es nuestra forma de salir de este lío.

translation.en: Are you ready?
-We're moving back into our old house. -[record scratch]
translation.es: Nos mudaremos a nuestra vieja casa.

translation.en: -What old house? -The house that you were raised in, son.
translation.es: ¿Qué vieja casa? La casa en la que creciste.

translation.en: -What? -But Auntie Jo lives there now.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Pero la tía Jo vive allí.

translation.en: There are five of us.
That is a whole mess of people in that tiny house.
translation.es: Es un montón de gente en esa casita.

translation.en: There can't possibly be enough space.
Listen, as long as we're together, we'll figure it out.
One bathroom, six people. I rest my case.
